title: Mr. Morale and the Big Trenders 5/13: Kendrick Lamar, NBA, Elon Musk, Friday The 13th, Mike Pence
itunes:title: Mr. Morale and the Big Trenders 5/13: Kendrick Lamar, NBA, Elon Musk, Friday The 13th, Mike Pence
description:
In this edition of Mr. Morale and the Big Trenders, Jack and Miles discuss Mr. Morale and the Big Steppers and other new music, the NBA playoffs, Elon Musk saying his Twitter deal is "on hold", Friday the 13th, and Mike Pence caping for Brian Kemp in Georgia,

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
